about_the_game:
Who are we without our memories? It's the year 2083 and most of Maya's memories have faded from her mind, but a dream spirit offers to help her remember her past by helping her piece together her dreams.

Game Features

  • Mystery & Intrigue: Piece together the intricate dreams of Maya and discover her life story.

  • Flowing & wholesome: puzzle gameplay that feels flowing, wholesome and relaxing.

  • Build Maya's Room: Decorate Maya's room by unlocking keepsakes and trinkets.

  • Created by a BAFTA Nominated filmmaker.

PIECE TOGETHER INTRICATE DREAMS

Relaxing puzzle game where you piece together increasingly complex and vivid dreams that forms a storyboard of Maya's life. Lose yourself with layered, flowing, and wholesome gameplay that transforms as you play.

DISCOVER A STORY OF MYSTERY AND INTRIGUE

Piece together over 17 chapter of her life and discover her beautiful story that follows her from a baby to an old woman. Discover a secret about her life that is filled with mystery and intrigue.

HELP MAYA REMEMBER HER LIFE

With each puzzle you solve, earn Somna to craft forgotten keepsakes. Watch as Maya's room fills with cherished belongings, and she discovers that her life was never truly empty, but vibrant with meaning.

LUNA, THE DREAM SPIRIT

You will interpret with the help of a dream spirit, who comes in the shape of Maya's childhood cat called, Luna. As well as helping you interpret the dreams Luna will also help you to solve puzzles.

name: The Dream Interpreter Demo
short_description: Help Maya remember her life by piecing together fragments of her dreams. Lose yourself in this relaxing and meaningful game that uncovers a beautiful story through dreams and symbols.
